source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(last_modified) as lastInserted from usersADF

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from usersADF where 
last_modified <= '@{activity('lastInsertedDataDate').output.firstRow.lastInserted}' 
and last_modified > '@{activity('last_mDateOFTblControl').output.firstRow.last_load}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'
